page.title: 10HEDGEROWS
page.content:
There are many different types of hedges such as thorn hedge, which is the most common. There are also others such as box hedge, copper beech, privet, holly hedge and many more.
You mostly find thorn hedge around the fields. They are grown from little twigs which are cut from a hedge and planted into the ground. This is mostly done between about October and April and gives them a chance to catch and grow.
A hedge is a very popular place for birds to build their nests, out of sight, so that people will not take their eggs. Birds are very wise.
